>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.H3ogllRvvxw3SOMu]{Espionage Specialist}

To do your work, you can’t afford to be recognized, and you also need to impersonate rival personnel—sometimes on short notice. Therefore, you have created numerous identities for yourself, with names and electronic documents to back them up. You find it easy to slip into any of your assumed personas with but a few moments of mental calibration and physical preparation.

Once per day as a full action, so long as you have access to an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.5GM9QlhUd1EB1LjJ]{upgraded comm unit}, a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.otaeKr7gtlGCvpPX]{datapad}, or any other type of computer, you can produce a false identity complete with forged documents, an official identification card or badge, and a minimal infosphere presence. As normal when creating forged documents, you must attempt a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IqOCYDKd9NgBwowp]{Computers} skill check to create the forgery, and any creatures scrutinizing any of your documents can attempt an opposed Computers check to detect the forgery, with all the normal DC modifiers for other circumstances. If your forged identity includes significantly changing your visual appearance, you can use the result of your Computers check for your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.aayAhTaRzitONs5U]{Disguise} check to change your appearance, though you still must use a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.I3ghqhtQ56N2ZIjD]{disguise kit}, a spell such as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.HGg3fIQGDzUwueVa]{disguise self}, or a technological device such as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.BqC7LI0RlKsBmgAH]{holoskin} when using this aspect of improvised forgery.
